entry.title: $2200 // Full Floor 3br apartment
entry.content:
Set like an alluring, jewel in the Ocean Hill/Historic BedStuy area, near all major transportation lines: 2, 3, 4, A and C trains, with a 25 minute commute into Manhattan. The neighborhood offers easy access to corner stores, a laundromat on the corner and a grocery store around the corner.

This full floor converted 3bd/1ba apartment offers simple beauty and sunlit rooms, with North and South exposures. Only one flight up on the second floor, this massive converted three bedroom apartment would be able to accommodate a Queen or King size bed in each bedroom and with a plethora of closet space.

$2,200 price is advertised as net effective. The gross monthly rent is $2,500, which includes ALL UTILITIES (electricity, gas, A/C, heat/water, basic cable & wifi). NO PETS. NO SMOKING. Roommates allowed. Private parking available, for additional monthly fee.

Please text/email to schedule a viewing today! Text "OHR" or email with subject "OHR".
